articles.author: Jenni Reid, Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: European stocks cautiously higher after UK inflation surpasses expectations; Fed rate decision due - CNBC
articles.description: European markets opened flat on Wednesday, after U.K. inflation unexpectedly accelerated.
articles.content:
U.K. annual inflation increased from 10.1% in January to 10.4% in February, official figures showed. Economists in a Refinitiv poll expected a 9.9% increase.
Core inflation, which excludes energy, f… [+799 chars]

articles.author: The Economist
articles.title: How bad are the current market jitters? - The Economist
articles.description: The wider stockmarket has been relatively unruffled by the trouble within banking
